website_summaries.verdict: A light floral spray that can be used to help set your makeup or as a refresher on a hot day.
pros: Contains fragrant herbal extracts and rosewater
Suitable as a makeup setting spray and a refreshing moisturizer throughout the day
cons: If you have sensitive skin, this could cause you to break out

customer_reviews.title: Fragrance/Parfum & Phenoxyethanol*
customer_reviews.text: Feels Amazing, my girlfriend got me hooked on it a while back. But, after doing some research and noticing some changes to my skin, we realized that some of the ingredients can be very harmful. Mainly, fragrance/parfum and phenoxyethanol, *a potential neurotoxin and common allergen, were of great concern. Maybe if it was more natural and eco friendly, I would give it 5 stars. Before learning about the harsh chemicals found in this product, I was very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Zaid

customer_reviews.title: Placebo effect?
customer_reviews.text: My fiancée says it smells like his grandma’s house, but I personally love the smell of rose water. I don’t really notice any moisturizing properties though. I use about 8-10 spritzes every time and it feels great for the first ten seconds, but then my face feels exactly the same as before. Doesn’t hurt but doesn’t really do anything.
customer_reviews.author: Farhana I.

customer_reviews.title: Unsure if this is legitimate product.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased and loved this product before, when bought in store at Nordstrom Rack. I don’t know what’s going on, as I thought this was a verified seller, but the item came in a ziplock bag and I’m getting blotches all over my face (everything else in my skin care routine was normal). I wouldn’t describe myself as having sensitive skin. I also don’t see the same dewy finish and hydrated feeling that was achieved from my previous bottles. Highly suspicious and will be throwing out for safety.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Dewy and sunkissed looking!
customer_reviews.text: I like to apply this after I do my foundation I let it dry, then I do my contouring, eye make up, and then I spray it again to set it. I love the way it makes my skin glow.

I do want to add the rose smell was much stronger than I thought it would be, and the spray itself was broken (not the cap, but the actual spray) which wasn't a big deal, but I did have to buy a new bottle to put it in. customer_reviews.title: No added benefit for me

My break outs continued to worsen throughout the week and once I discontinued this spray, my face cleared up immediately! I know everyone's skin is different so I would say give it a try but don't get your hopes up.

It dries pretty fast with just a couple squirts and I use this first after I clean my face then I put a serum on followed by a moisturizer and I feel like this helps the other stuff soak in and its easier to apply. Sometimes I just use this by it self and it is refreshing, not oily, very light on face.

customer_reviews.title: I like this spray and have used many bottles

customer_reviews.title: Not good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Gets great reviews and I wanted to love it. Smells great, but not for sensitive skin. Contains sodium to dry out your skin, and also contains red and blue dye in it. Not something you should be putting on your face. I used it on my face after a shower, and it immediately started stinging. I decided I wanted to try it again after applying a great moisturizer and it once again made my skin sting, and start to dry it out. I can see how if you don't have sensitive or dry skin this could be a decent product. For me personally I don't also want to spray my face with red and blue dyes.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, improved by Amazon's GLASS atomizer that works!
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this product twice, but really love it and believe it to be excellent. It seems similar to an ancient cosmetic wash called "Hungarian Water". However, the "spray" part of the bottle is useless, as it drips, sputters and runs down the side. I purchased some wonderful, amber colored glass cosmetic spray bottles from Amazon, which solved this problem. The product is wonderful both as a freshener after moisturizing and as a finishing spray, after makeup! The rose water smells so fresh and the aloe and other herbs are very good for the skin and leave a healthy sheen. Excellent product, which would be dramatically improved by using a glass spray bottle that actually worked!
customer_reviews.author: baj

customer_reviews.title: made skin break out
customer_reviews.text: okay, so i've been hearing for this product for over a year now and know how widely touted it is by beauty & skin care aficionados, but this product did not work for me. It made me break out and did not provide any noticeable benefits. I thought the breakout may have been my skin adjusting to a new product, but it just seemed to get worse - using this for 3 weeks my skin progressively got worse and immediately improved after I stopped using it. Please note, i have sensitive skin and have experienced eczema so it may be my skin reacting poorly. I did enjoy the light scent, though.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This facial spray is a great treat for my face. I have been using it several years. I love spraying after cleansing for a nice refreshing carrier for my serums and moisturizer to absorb into my skin. I also love spraying this on my face during the day for a light moisturizing pick me up. It has never given me any irritation or stung my eyes. It has a nice light rose smell that is not over powering in any way. I highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a nice facial spray with a light scent that is lightly moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolette S.

customer_reviews.title: Not good for your skin
customer_reviews.text: For a spray that seems so natural and good for your skin, this really breaks me out! I have read that there are dyes in this to make the pink color of the spray which is also disappointing. Essentially I think this is just perfume for your face and does not actually do much of anything to hydrate or tone. I tried using this again after awhile thinking something else might have broken out my usually clear skin but the bumps and zits returned as soon as I restarted using this. Skip this one and go for organic pure rose water spray next time!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: ... I had high hopes for this but I feel like it actually dried my face out rather than hydrate ...

Their cucumber and green tea spray is the better purchase in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Nice smelling water
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this stuff but i just didn’t. I read that it could be used as a setting spray and it definitely didn’t work for me. Makeup wore off faster than some of my budget setting sprays. The rose smells amazing and it does make me momentarily happy to smell it on my face, but it doesn’t appear to actually do anything... I won’t be purchasing this again. Though it’ll probably expire before I use it all. Also my bottle came very leaky, which it seems like the seller predicted (or knew about) because they shipped it in a clear bag within the box.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: PACKAGE CAME DAMAGED AND SOME OF THE PRODUCT SPILLED!

customer_reviews.author: KAL

customer_reviews.title: This is One of Must Have Items in my Purse
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely fall in love with this face mist. I have been trying different kind of brands that I bought from Sephora and Ipsy and this is came out as amazing. First, I love the subtle smell in it. The second is that my make up stayed up to 12 hours and didn't even show my tired face. It makes my face dewy and moist. I put on my face after midnight during my late night shift and I felt energized on my face. I also put inside fridge to give more boost and kick on my face when it needed.
customer_reviews.author: Widi Widiya

customer_reviews.title: Good product! Terrible spray bottle.
customer_reviews.text: So, I absolutely love this facial spray! My only complaint is that every single bottle I get the spraying head is always semi-clogged so it sprays a jet onto my face instead of a fine mist. I’ve gotten SEVERAL bottles of this product now and the first few times I was like okay maybe I just got a bad bottle. No, it’s every single time. It may sound like a minute inconvenience but it really hinders the usability of the product and gets so annoying when it sprays a jet of rose water into my eyes. Happy yet disappointed, again. I will most likely move to a different product after this bottle.

customer_reviews.title: i dont like the lsit of ingredients

customer_reviews.title: Works great!

Also, it smells great. I was worried that I would get an expired bottle or a bottle that was left in the heat and turned, but I didn't. It smells and looks great as always and works just as well as it has when I've bought it in retail stores!
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle

I have sensitive skin that is a mis of dry and oily, and I have had no negative reaction so far. It smells so pleasant and feels so refreshing. Love it.

customer_reviews.title: Only face spray I'll ever use

Sometimes it helps remove eye makeup from the night before if I don't have time to fully wash my face. It also helps after I've spent too much time in the sun to cool my face down. I use serum and moisturizer after this as well. I highly recommend this amazing face saving product!
customer_reviews.author: GM15

customer_reviews.title: Soo refreshing!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this facial spray! It is so refreshing to mist on my face half way through my day. It smells wonderful, nice rose hip smell but nothing over powering, clean and fresh. I have sensitive skin and sometimes get a burning sensation and this spray calms that down and moisturizes my skin a bit. My favorite thing is how refreshing it feels.

customer_reviews.title: So refreshing!

customer_reviews.author: Danielle

I’ve also sprayed it on top of my make up and while i don’t see the setting effect others remark, it does help to freshen your face and makeup especially after a long day. Definitely recommend.

Regarding effectiveness - I also don't feel like this spray is moisturizing at all. What's all the hype about? It also broke me out. I have reactive, sensitive skin so I should've read the ingredients and stayed away but curiosity got the best of me this time. I don't recommend this spray.
customer_reviews.author: PhyliciaHaa

customer_reviews.title: Love this product, unreliable packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Ok. I love this spray. I’ve been using it for a while and thought that this deal on Amazon was great HOWEVER the smaller bottle leaked IMMEDIATELY and ruined my bag (it’s leather) despite me ensuring it was tight. The last time I purchased the travel size was at Ulta and had the same issue and so this time, I wanted to make sure the top was on extra tight. It somehow has a little ‘give’ on its own and I am really disappointed in the packaging/ quality assurance.
customer_reviews.author: lynndeesanghee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: It seems kind of silly that a rose water spray would make such a huge difference - but it totally does! I have hormonal pregnant skin and use 4-5 spritz of this religiously every morning and night after I was my face. It keeps my mild eczema prone skin from flaking in any season, and is not so heavily moisturizing that it clogs my pores throughout the day/night. Makes my skin feel refreshed and light, definitely helps prevent my skin from those irritable hormonal breakouts! Would definitely recommend giving this a try!
customer_reviews.author: Krysta

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: This leaves your face very shiny! I have combo skin, dry everywhere except my forehead and while this moisturized my face, it left my forehead sooooo shiny. It’s weird, in order to give you a dewy look it leaves a shiny “film” all over your face, I usually don’t let it dry but instead pat it on my face with clean hands. It did absolutely nothing for clearing up my skin or reducing the redness of my acne. On the other hand it smells amazing and it didn’t cause further breakouts. I probably would repurchase just to freshen up and cool my face when I’m at work or during summer, but honestly any other face mist would work the same.
customer_reviews.author: ngngngng

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED review. Keep looking!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: 2nd Purchase- Gross! It left a tacky residue. MB customer service confirmed authenticity. They said they ship directly to Amazon, but product guarantees are only for purchases through mariobadescu.com. I told them about the residue and was told, “I don’t know what to say about it.” Hard pass on this. ———- This is a rare product that hasn’t caused redness, burning, and breakouts. It’s perfect for parched skin while traveling and during the dry winter months. I use 2-3 spritzes after washing my face and during the day. It gives that little bit of necessary moisture to keep fresh while keeping oily skin in check.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: This Spray is Life Honty!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this product 10 stars, I would!!! This has become an essential part of my daily skin care and make up routine. After applying makeup, it works great as a finisher if you love having that dewy glow. It also works amazingly as a final step in your skin care routine after applying moisturizer. It really helps to lock in moisture. Use it as a refresher thruout the day. I promise that you will not be disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Keisha

customer_reviews.title: Forget the negative reviews!
customer_reviews.text: I really TRULY have always loved skincare, but never really had a solid routine. Now that I’ve developed one, I wanted to try some new brands. This one was recommended by a friend. I have sensitive dry skin and was super nervous, but it works great. Unless you have scabbed off scratched skin, this should not cause ANY pain, and for me really refreshed and renewed my skin with one use. Totally recommend it to any skincare lover!
customer_reviews.author: Pearle Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and feels refreshing!
customer_reviews.text: I got this on a whim and I love it! I've been spraying it in my face on hot days and it's so refreshing. I got sunburned the other day doing yard work and sprayed some of this on the worst part and it definitely helped, probably because of the aloe. If you love the smell of roses this is great!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer C.D.

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: My skin is incredibly sensitive and acne-prone, but I love this product. I've gone through several bottles. If you don't like rosewater scents then you probably won't like this. I've also tried the lavender facial spray, but this is better in my opinion. The bottle lasts me a very long time. I put it on after my other skin care both morning and night. I feel it helps to brighten my skin and make it feel softer. It would also be a great after-sun refresher if you keep it in the fridge!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa W.

customer_reviews.title: Multi Use
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I have short hair and I spray it in my hair after the shower. I have been using this for some time now and I have replaced it with conditioner. It's like using a plant-based high-quality conditioner. I have fine hair and it doesn't weigh my hair down yet makes if soft and moisturizes. I also spray it on my face after the shower. I can't say it moisturizes my face but it makes my skin brighter, healthier-looking. I like the scent as well. I have sensitive skin and it does not irritate at all. It's very refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Akers

customer_reviews.title: Happy😊
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell, the way it makes my skin feel. I got a small bottle at first, just to see how it would do and I must say I was very pleased. I ordered the 8 oz and will use as soon as I'm done with the smaller one.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: This stuff has such a strange odor. It makes me sick to my stomach when sprayed. Not only that, I have purchased the aloe version (green bottle) in-store and this has a totally different feel to it. Not sure if MB changed their formula or if this is a knock off. Either way, if you're going to purchase this item, do yourself a favor and go find it at your nearest Ulta or beauty store.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Arrived nearly empty.
customer_reviews.text: *Mine arrived partially opened and the toner leaked out in my box it came in. So, I only had about a tablespoon full of it. Could've happened in transit or maybe supplier didn.t put the cap on tight enough. So, Amazon is sending me another one. I still gave it 5 stars because I really like it...have had it before and it feels like i.m actually nourishing my skin. Plus it smells really great. I will order more when this runs out! :)
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive skin rejoice!
customer_reviews.text: Great for super sensitive skin, this facial spray hydrates and sets a great foundation for primer (or just a naked face 😎) without clogging pores or irritating your skin. It is softly scented, but that dissipated quickly. I hear this is also great for setting makeup, but I don't "bake" when I wear a full face, so I can't speak to that.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Amazon has a great deal on it compared to Ulta
customer_reviews.text: Second time purchasing this stuff, Amazon has a great deal on it compared to Ulta. I love to spray this on my face first thing in the morning, after I put on makeup (sort of like a setting spray), and after I wash my face at night. It just helps give that extra bit of moisture to help your skin not feel so dry. Very refreshing! If you don’t like rose scent stay far away, however I find it pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: My favorite spray to set and refresh I’m telling you I always keep this in my bag , during the summer you’re gonna want to have this in travel size and the big size to refill , my makeup can go 0-100 throughout the day when it’s wearing down or not meshing into the skin anymore I’ll spray some of this and use my finger tips to press around any areas line the nose crevices and voila good as new FORREAL and yes I have tried the rose water from the botanicas which is fine for toning at night but doesn’t do what this does throughout the day
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Osuna

customer_reviews.title: Great product for crazy skin
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin with dry patches, oily places, hyperpigmentation, and very stubborn adult acne that flares up with just about any product. This hasn't done much for my acne but my there's been a huge improvement in my complexion. The dry spots are gone, the oil isn't as bad, and the hyperpigmentation is going away. It does seem to help old acne heal a little faster but doesn't prevent any new spots.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and face feels fresh!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this product in Ulta and Amazon and it is the exact same product just at a cheaper price on Amazon! Sometimes I will just spray it on my face for a quick refresh and after using cleanser, I use this on a cotton round to take off any extra makeup. I’ve heard this can be used to set makeup but it’s very wet when sprayed directly on the face so I have been hesitant to try. Overall satisfied with the product and scent is fresh and feminine!
customer_reviews.author: FindersKeepers

customer_reviews.title: Thank god for this
customer_reviews.text: I've always had dry skin and acne, and tried all kinds of skincare products to help that. Not even proactiv, or moisturizers recommended by my doctor worked, in fact, they all just dried out my skin worse and caused more problems. My girlfriend suggested that I try this rosewater, and it works amazing. It keeps my skin smooth and hydrated, and any zits I have decrease significantly in size and redness. I would recommend using this a couple times a day, maybe once after waking up and once before going to sleep, but use it consistently to maintain your skin so no new problem spots form.
customer_reviews.author: R2027924

customer_reviews.title: Like buying a dozen roses for yourself!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this spray. I received it as a gift and used it liberally throughout the day when I first got it. Before Covid, when I was in the office all day, it was SO refreshing and helped my skin stay moisturized in the gross recirculated air (and was refreshing st the 3 o'clock hour when naps seem appropriate). I actually noticed a change in my skin very quickly. It felt more glowy and moisturized. I love it, I bought some more for myself and my parents who are obsessed now as well. Rose is so good for your skin and this version of it is affordable and just kinda lovely. And for $7 it's a smart purchase!
customer_reviews.author: alexandria watson

customer_reviews.title: It is hydrating and feels amazing on my face and neck after stepping outside into ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a necessity when you live in any hot or dry environment. It is hydrating and feels amazing on my face and neck after stepping outside into 100 plus degree days. It also is wonderful in the winter for dry skin. I love the smell and it doesn’t bother my fiancé who has very strong opinions of cleaning products, perfume etc. I have repurchased at least half a dozen times it and it one of the only products I have ever classified as holy grail.
customer_reviews.author: BDavis

customer_reviews.title: it is probably because you heard about it by word of mouth or on some product list like me. BUY THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking at this product already, it is probably because you heard about it by word of mouth or on some product list like me. BUY THIS PRODUCT! It is everything the rave reviews say. Whether you use it for a morning mist before applying makeup or throughout the day as a cooling mist, this rosewater spray is the bomb-diggity.
customer_reviews.author: Aproposamy

customer_reviews.title: Incredible spray!  I use it every day!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably about my tenth order of this spray! I’ve tried other brands but I always come back to this one. A lady in Florida where I was getting a spa facial recommended rose water and I’ve been using it ever since. I’ll be 50 this year and glad she told me about me about the benefits!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Tiff

customer_reviews.title: Cool, refreshing, sets my makeup, gives my face a “pickup.’
customer_reviews.text: This is the second bottle of Mario Badescu Facial Spray that I have purchased. The color seemed to be somewhat darker than the first bottle I owned but the rose aroma is also stronger. The facial spray is so refreshing and it helps to set my makeup. I use a light spray of it to my face a couple of times per day to revive my makeup — and it feels good and lifts my mood. I have made this facial spray a regular part of my makeup routine and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Anonimouse

customer_reviews.title: Great for face....and legs
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my face, neck and chest. I spritz lightly so it doesn’t feel sticky...but even if I go a little overboard, it only feels sticky for a couple minutes, until it dries completely. I also spray it all over my legs after shaving. And a few weeks ago, when my legs got a bit too much sun, I sprayed this on to soothe the burn. It was so much better to spray on something nice as opposed to rubbing lotion on skin that was already irritated. I love the Lavendar spray too!
customer_reviews.author: Jaline

customer_reviews.title: Updated!
customer_reviews.text: Update: So I've been taking probiotics to heal my gut flora and I wanted to try this product again after my skin had a reaction to it and it is an amazing product! My skin was very sensitive and anything I put on it made it breakout including this rose water. Now that I'm taking probiotics my skin isn't breaking out and this product balances my skin out very well. I also love how my skin is looking beautiful and glowy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Not the same
customer_reviews.text: A friend gave me a bottle for my wedding in Feb 2019, and I loved it!! So I ordered again but this time it's not the same.... It's sticky/tacky feeling and I learned it has fragrance in it of all things! I avoid that as much as possible due to the studies showing links to cancer. I'm disappointed, I used to love using two or three times a day because it helped heal my eyelids that had bad skin. Now I forget it half the time because it's not enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: L&J

customer_reviews.title: Brighter days...
customer_reviews.text: I’m very pleasantly surprised by this product! It’s benefits have far exceeded my expectations. I originally bought it to set powder when applying makeup, and as a way to combat dry air in my apartment. It works great for both of those purposes, but on top of all that I’m enjoying clearer, brighter skin. People close to me have been remarking on a noticeable, healthier glow, and this is the only difference in my skin care routine. It took about a month of regular use to see these results, but I’m loving it! And at such an affordable price, this really can’t be beat!
customer_reviews.author: K Dyan

customer_reviews.title: Unethical company
customer_reviews.text: I used this product a lot and really liked it until I read about their class-action lawsuit from 2013, and their refusal to disclose the entirety of their formulas on their packaging. Unfortunately I dont feel comfortable buying this product again because of their unethical business practices. This has been a lesson in getting reeled in by internet hype and the dangers of not doing research.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: I’m od’ing on it
customer_reviews.text: I was using this a week then ended up buying the 3 packaged 1,I just wanted something 2 refresh my face cas it’s summer&hot out,I was using a makeup setting spray I had but felt like it was drying out my skin&i feel this product does the opposite,no break outs,nice rose smell,heavy(as in you can def smell it) but not overpowering bad,it’s nice,refreshing&i’m gg spray my face rn,my niece recently got a rose spray I like the way hers sprays better more of a mist spray,I also just ordered another from a different brand not sure which I like best yet
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie S

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute go to product! I love it. It is awesome to put on after I wash my face and head to work or on top of make up if it is a fancier occasion (or bad breakout). As someone with oily yet sensitive skin I have a hard time finding face products and moisturizers that I like. Look no further, you have arrived.
customer_reviews.author: grouchosays

customer_reviews.title: MIRACLE IN A BOTTLE
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin that has hormonal acne and at times very dry patches, I spray this on after cleaning my face. I use Elemis rose collagen cleanser and immediately after cleansing, lightly patting my skin dry, then I keep spraying this on throughout the day. My skin is COMPLETELY healed. No other skin care products than cleanser and this Rose spray. Dry patches GONE. I end up with skin like GLASS.
customer_reviews.author: Dark Gift

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to the hype
customer_reviews.text: After reading about this wonder-spray in so many places, I finally surrendered and tried it myself. It absolutely deserves the rave reviews! I love to spray my face first thing in the morning; it makes me feel fresh and smells just gorgeous. Especially in the summer, it feels wonderful to spritz on during the day for just a bit of moisture and refreshing. I love it so much, I bought it for my Mom, too, and she loves it now.
customer_reviews.author: Fancy Cookie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: *note: I found that the smaller bottle of this has a finer mist than the larger one--I just pour little by little from the larger one.* I LOVE this product to refresh my makeup or to spray it after I've finished my makeup to remove the powdery look. The first time I tried this I purchased the small bottle at Ulta and then found the bigger size here and I use the small bottle because the mist is much finer and won't spit out globs on your makeup. This will forever be a holy grail product of mine--just gives your face a fresh look and feel.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Mario Badescu Facial Spray with Aloe, Herbs and Rosewater
product_meta.description: Size:8 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)A refreshing, hydrating mist to use anywhere anytime. Simply formulated with fragrant Herbal Extracts and Rosewater for a pleasant, pick me up for dehydrated, tight and uncomfortable skin. Spray your day and night creams for a boost of hydration or use it to set make-up or spray on dry hair throughout the day. Safe for all skin types. Gentle, non-irritating. Ingredients-Aqua (Water, Eau), Propylene Glycol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Rosa Canina Extract, Thymus Vulgaris (Thyme) Leaf Extract, Fucus Vesiculosus Extract, Gardenia Florida Fruit Extract, Caprylyl Glycol, Hexylene Glycol, Polysorbate 20, Parfum (Fragrance), Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Chloride, Citronellol, Geraniol, CI 17200 (Red 33), CI 42090 (Blue 1)
